ucdxml:block:
code-point-attributes &= attribute kEH_Cat { xsd:string { pattern="([A-IK-Z]|AA)-\d{2}-\d{3}" } }?
code-point-attributes &= attribute kEH_Core { "C" | "L" | "N" }?
code-point-attributes &= attribute kEH_Desc { xsd:string { pattern='[^\t"]+' } }?
code-point-attributes &= attribute kEH_Func { xsd:string { pattern='[^\t"]+' } }?
code-point-attributes &= attribute kEH_FVal { xsd:string { pattern="[bdf-hjkmnpr-twy\.,/\-\+=;?>\&\(\)\{\}\s\x{303}\x{30C}\x{323}\x{32E}\x{331}\x{A723}\x{A725}\x{A7BD}]+" } }?
code-point-attributes &= attribute kEH_UniK { xsd:string { pattern="([A-IK-Z]|AA|NL|NU)\d{3}[A-Z]{0,2}|HJ ([A-IK-Z]|AA)\d{3}[A-Z]{0,2}" } }?
code-point-attributes &= attribute kEH_JSesh { list { ( xsd:string { pattern="([A-IK-Z]|Aa|NL|NU|Ff)\d{1,3}[A-Za-z]{0,5}" } | xsd:string { pattern="(US1|US22|US248|US685)([A-IK-Z]|Aa|NL|NU)\d{1,3}[A-Za-z]{0,5}" } )+}}?
code-point-attributes &= attribute kEH_HG { list { xsd:string { pattern="([A-IK-Z]|AA)\d{1,3}[A-Za-z]{0,2}" }+ } }?
code-point-attributes &= attribute kEH_IFAO { list { xsd:string { pattern="\d{1,3},\d{1,2}[ab]?" }+ } }?
code-point-attributes &= attribute kEH_NoMirror { boolean }?
code-point-attributes &= attribute kEH_NoRotate { boolean }?
code-point-attributes &= attribute kEH_AltSeq { text }?e
